description: Structured information about the description of a prospective workflow.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo._instruction: Add all parties that fulfill the role of a custodian for this research product (e.g., a research group leader or principle investigator). Custodians are typically the main contact in case of misconduct, obtain permission from the contributors to publish personal information, and maintain the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of the research product. Unless specified differently, this custodian will be responsible for all attached research product versions.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.title: custodian

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description (or abstract) of this research product. Note that this should be a suitable description for all attached research product versions.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.title: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel._instruction: Add all parties that developed this workflow recipe.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel.description: Legal person that creates or improves products or services (e.g., software, applications, etc.).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel.title: developer

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product. Note that this digital identifier will be used to reference all attached research product versions.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.title: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (or title) for this research product. Note that this should be a suitable full name for all attached research product versions.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.title: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe._instruction: Add all versions of this workflow recipe.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe.description: Reference to variants of an original.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe.title: hasVersion

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.title: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this research product. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.description: Preferred format for citing a particular object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.title: howToCite

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a short name (or alias) for this research product that could be used as a shortened display title (e.g., for web services with too little space to display the full name).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.title: shortName
